wines.description: Crafted in 2023, this wine reveals plum and red fruits. A wine that balances tradition with modern winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with pronounced aromas of dark fruits and spice, followed by complex notes of oak. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, complex takes center stage, complemented by balanced and structured. The velvety texture and harmonious structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The lingering finish is elegant and persistent, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.productName: Stel + Mar Sauvignon Blanc (DC, MD, and Southern VA Only) NV
wines.description: A distinguished contemporary bottling that presents grass and herbaceous. Ideal for both casual sipping and special occasions.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with intense aromas of gooseberry and passion fruit, followed by layered notes of elderflower. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, herbaceous takes center stage, complemented by mineral and crisp acidity. The smooth texture and integrated structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The long finish is refined and zesty, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.productName: Domaine Borgeot Santenay 1er cru Les Gravieres Rouge 2021
wines.description: From the 2021 vintage, expect tobacco and blackberry. Represents excellent value for this quality level.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with subtle aromas of floral and dark fruits, followed by nuanced notes of spice. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, structured takes center stage, complemented by fruit-forward and complex. The polished texture and cohesive structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The extended finish is polished and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.
